website_summaries.verdict: We like the highly customizable Logitech Cordless Desktop LX710 Laser, but we found its overly sensitive quick-launch buttons really annoying.
pros: nearly every button and key is customizable with included software
comfortable keyboard and highly responsive mouse
software works with all stripes of Windows, including Vista
cons: Easy to accidentally activate the quick-launch buttons along keyboard's edge
mouse may be too narrow for some users

customer_reviews.title: good, could use more added features
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Logitech cordless desktop LX710 and now I am sending it back. Easy to set up and start using. 2 things for me. Mouse was to small for me. Not that I have big hands but after a while my hand started to bother me. 2nd thing The cap lock-no light or anything to show you are using CAPS or not. Usually not a problem but when you are typing a password-case senitive-no way of telling it was in caps or not. Lots of error messages for me. Small I know but a factor for me. Shop around I thought the price was a little high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Item!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was prompt (2-days for Super Saver) and keyboard and mouse are comfortable, and work well. Touch of the keyboard is excellent. Software shipped with units was not latest version. Vista software was downloaded at Logitech web site. CD included was labelled for XP and 2000. I was disappointed that the programmable hot keys require that the "Function" key be pressed along with the F-key... There is a key labelled "VOIP" that would be more useful if it were labelled "internet." At (...) rebate, it is a real bargain...
customer_reviews.author: eds65

customer_reviews.title: Three Years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I have found this keyboard/mouse to be very well manufactuered and it has worked flawlessly for me for over 3 years now. The only reason I am giving this keyboard/mouse a 4-star rating instead of 5 is the cost. I have another wireless keyboard/mouse that was cheaper but I like just as much as this more pricy one. I've dropped both the keyboard and the mouse several times and still they are working perfectly. I can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GaryBV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, many helpful features...buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I won't bore you with the same praises as everyone else, but suffice it to say I have purchased many of these for myself, for family and for clients. The build is concise and reasonably rugged. The features are numerous...and more importantly, they all WORK as described or labeled. Battery life is well within reason and installing it is as simple as can be. If you're looking to free up your workspace from cables, this is an excellent, reliable, feature-rich solution. Buy it!!! Ray
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cone

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many Logitech products, from mice and keyboards to speakers and web cams. This keyboard/mouse combination is equal to the high expectations I've come to expect. The feel of the keys is firm and responsive. The mouse is accurate and tracks well. I like the USB laser combination over the bluetooth variety. There is never a time that I am disconnected by transmittal problems. I was so happy with this product for the PC that I purchased a similar product for my MAC Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard and Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this keyboard. Only a couple of issues for me: 1. when raised to the highest position, it is basically flat (maybe to promote more natural hand position); 2. I don't like the position of the delete key, which is not where I normally like it, and the Home, End, Page Up and Down keys are not logically positioned--at least based upon my experience. Other than that, it is nice to have a wireless keyboard. $53 on Amazon was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Cordless keyboard made HP Mini more productive
customer_reviews.text: We have a HP Mini that we got for travel. But when my wife broke her foot, it became her primary computer for a while because our computer room is on the second floor of our home. The keyboard on the mini is just too small for serious work. I bought the Logitech cordless desktop set for her to try. She loves it! She puts a lap pillow under the keyboard with her foot up on an otterman and blazes away. The keyboard seems to work better then the cord keyboard on her desktop. May have to buy another set for that computer now. Setup was simple.
customer_reviews.author: B. Routh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -- highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought an HP cordless desktop at Walmart and returned it two days later because it had a cheap feel to it. For a few dollars more, I bought this Logitech cordless desktop from Amazon. It is much better. The keyboard and laser mouse feel solid and well constructed. You won't find a cordless desktop of this quality at a store for this price. It was a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard/mouse combo. I didn't even have to adjust the mouse after I installed it; the smaller buttons in the center are pretty cool too. The keyboard types very well in my opinion. I do quite a bit of typing and this keyboard responds quite rapidly. The keys are sturdy, not fragile, like some other brands. And the BEST feature of all.....The programmable 'hot' buttons. I have changed them around a bit and it's a great way to personalize your keyboard. A very good deal for the price.....give it a try! :-)
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: LogitechCordless Desktop LX 710 laser
customer_reviews.text: 11/21/07 I like the keyboard and mouse. I'm used to seeing the "Cap" light on in the corner on the keyboard. It's not there.........when you hit the "Cap Lock" it comes up on the monitor......but if I'm in a hurry, I tend to forget that the "Caps" are still on. I'll adjust eventually. I haven't had time to figure out all of the other functions on the keyboard yet, but I will. It's a soft and easy keyboard with no reflective qualities and the mouse is great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Best Refurbished a ninja ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 3 years ago and it still works fine, it is a great product and i purchased it refurbished and it still works good. it has been a trooper for me for 3 years and deserves the 5 stars it gets, tho the time for a upgrade is fastly approaching i dont regret buying this set one bit.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I expected a few glitches, but the wireless mouse and keyboard works perfectly. in fact, I did not even have to install the software, it just worked out of box via standard drivers. all the extra buttons work as well (e.g. Play, Internet, Volume, etc.) Great price and value.
customer_reviews.author: David Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent equipment!
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is so comfortable and works a good distance from my laptop. The flat style of the keyboard and the preset feature makes working so easy. Beautiful design and really does encourage me to keep working. It makes working fun (for me that is LOL). The battery tester is a preety cool feature too (on the keyboard) it'll tell you when your battery needs changing. Real simple connectivity. Especially if you're using the Vista Ultimate.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: LX710
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am very satisfied with this keyboard and mouse. However, the keyboard should have a LED indicating CAP Lock and Num Lock ON at the keys themselves rather than displaying on the monitor. If you don't mind this odd indication, you will love this wireless combo.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second LX 710 Laser keyboard/mouse combo I've purchased. Both work fantastic and I've had no problems with either one. Batteries seem to last a long time and I use my computer at least 8 hours a day for both work and personal. Installation/setup was easy, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Excellant wireless keyboard/mouse combo
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent keyboard/mouse combo! The keyboard has good key position and is comfortable to use for a long time. The mouse is very easy to use and the advanced features (forward/back button, scroll wheel) are easy to access. It fits in my hand very well and is comfortable to use for a long time. I surf the internet quite a bit and the mouse button layout is good. So far the battery life has been good. I have had the combo for 2 months and have used it everyday. The batteries still read full. Overall excellent combo for a wireless desktop.
customer_reviews.author: P. Petrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It works well, has great range, and is fully functional! My wife's favorite features are the multi-media buttons. We watch lots of TV shows and movies from our media computer on our HDTV, so it works great! And... you gotta LOVE the price!!! If I had a complaint, it would only be that the mouse doesn't work on all surfaces... but then again, what mouse does??? So it's really not against this particular combo, just mice in general.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Fogg

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Features for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these keyboards and have had no problems with installation or use (I use them with a Dell laptop with MS XP.) Setting up and using the many function keys is very easy and they are real time savers. The only problem I have with the keyboard is that it does not fit in my laptop bag, but I haven't found any other full feature model that does either.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Sears

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wireless keyboard and mouse combination that I have used to date. The one flaw on the keyboard is the legs which do not snap solidly in place. I have to use it folded up because one of them will not stay open.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this cordless desktop
customer_reviews.text: This cordless desktop is very comfortable to use and it eliminates more cords. I haven't had to replace the keyboard batteries and I replace the mouse batteries once a year. I bought it for a good price and it's been a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. PIERCE

customer_reviews.title: Longest Wireless range i've come across!
customer_reviews.text: like the subject says, with this wireless desktop, i can be clear across the room and still able to use the mouse & keyboard without flakey response. and with the mouse being a Laser type, I can use it on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great product just be sure to hook it up with the kensington dockstation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to use it with the kensington sd100s docking station and its been working smooth for 3 years+ (yes 3 years!).
customer_reviews.author: emmh

customer_reviews.title: Range is short.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit to control a computer connected to a TV set. The supported range is quite short-- maybe 10 to 15 feet. I have seen other units with much longer range. Other than that, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: A geek

customer_reviews.title: Not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard lags terribley. It will barely work if you have it too close to the wireless reciever. The Mouse lags terribley. You absolutely cannot play computer games with this or you will want to break your computer. Maybe I just got a bad one though....other than that, everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product, key layout a little diferent, battery sucker
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product eliminating all the cables and allowing easy adjustment of volume and other features. However, be prepared to change the batteries very often! It is probably a good idea to work with rechargeables.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: So far the keyboard and mouse have been working perfectly. It's great not playing tug of war with wires anymore. Make sure you download the newest software from the Logitech website as it corrects some minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Schiffner

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard and mouse set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good keyboard and mouse set for anyone that is looking for one. This is easy to install and it's easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: himan123

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard-mouse combo
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard and mouse. It's really comfortable, and has easy plug and play connections. This is my 4th wireless combo and so far it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Nice tactile feel
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the mouse but I love the keyboard. It has a small footprint with many hot-keys. I like the relocation of the delete key but it has taken me awhile to get used to the end key.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pibus

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for the average user. I use it at work and home. I have had no issues with it and has good feel to it. Excellent buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: K. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice keyboard and mouse. The only problem is touching the parts on the side, which send up pictures, etc. That is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Starks

customer_reviews.title: great keyboard touch, mouse fits hand well
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard touch, mouse fits hand well. The only problem with the mouse is the forward and back buttons on the mouse take some getting used to. Battery life is great, and connection seems really strong. Never had a problem with mine, even when used 10 feet from another computer using the same exact keyboard/mouse combo. Haven't tested the range on the keyboard much, but the mouse has pretty good range.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Haefner

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for about a month now. No problems with any aspect of it. I love the fact that I can just unplug the thumb drive that sits in the desk holder and plug it in to my laptop and use both keyboard and mouse with the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LX 710
customer_reviews.text: Small and takes up very little desk space compared to the other larger logitech units. Not sure about the battery life too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard R. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Ideal keyboard/mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal size keyboard for both home and travel. Works very well with rapid typing speed. Very intuitive layout.
customer_reviews.author: FTX42

customer_reviews.title: Wireless wonder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use, and accurate mouse and keyboard responses. I couldn't be happier. Buy without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ream

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth Key Board and Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cordless keyboard and mouse. I purchased this based on the price and reviews. I like it very much. The install was very easy and my computer recognized it right away. It has a very quiet, soft, smooth touch. I really like no cords. The mouse is very comfortable and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rollf

customer_reviews.title: Not very ergonomic.
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this product is that it is cordless, but the ergonomics for this set is not good!!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an "obsolete" Logitech keyboard and mouse. This is a wonderful, no-gimmicks keyboard and mouse combo. It's not bent, it's not curved, not waved, not humped, not wedged, nor otherwise misshapen in any way. It's also the correct size to fit into a standard keyboard slide-out. Great concept, great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: great ensemble for you input needs
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews at Amazon about this keboard....My wife and I are old computer users and type well....The kebboard is quieter and more comfy than most of them out there....the mouse is nice as well....Grab one, it is like stealing when it comes to keyboards and mice...Priced just right....I would stack it up against "most" anything out there....
customer_reviews.author: lottakash

customer_reviews.title: Another great logitech
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard and mouse work great and have enough distance for my needs. Thanks logitech and amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Product and seller meet my high expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set to replace an old one, so the performance of all the Logitech Cordless desktop components is excellent and as expected. I am pleased with the seller's advertisement, packaging, and prompt delivery as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: average folk
customer_reviews.text: This product has preformed well. On occasion I'll hit the side buttons accidentally increasing or decreasing the size of the font but that's my only negative if you want to call it that.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Chadbourne

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Works great with my Vista Desktop system. Also purchased the Logitech cordless trackball mouse which works great. Highly recommend both items if you want to ditch the cords.
customer_reviews.author: P. Trueax

customer_reviews.title: Wireless mouse + keyboard combo
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It works very good for the distance of 10 feets. Mouse and keyboard are very sensitive as long as you have the receiver out of any obstruction.
customer_reviews.author: Loan D. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop LX 710 Laser
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product out at big chain store before purchasing. Amazon's price was the best and can't beat the shipping - came in couple of days prior to when said it would arrive. Really like the touch of the keys, easy set-up. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: trodgers

customer_reviews.title: great keyboard, still on first set of batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 6 months ago. It's got tons of buttons, but they don't get in the way. Very nice and elegantly laid out. I program for a living and am very particular about my keyboards. Love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Letters are barely visible
customer_reviews.text: Product worked okay, but the letters on the keyboard are so tiny, I replaced it with a standard Microsoft board. If you need to see the keys, don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Allen

customer_reviews.title: logitech cordless
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to synch up. Must press little buttons at once. Finaly got an IT guy to get it to work. Then after two days it quit again. So now I am using my old plug-in stuff and the wireless keyboard and mouse are sitting in the corner. Will send back when I get time.
customer_reviews.author: wind tiger

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good. I like the rub type material they used for part of this keyboard. The only thing I don't like is, they didn't glue the key very tight. But the key will only fall off from the keyboard when I throw the keyboard to the wall (some times I'm bad temper). But you could put it back after it falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Kang Xie

customer_reviews.title: Decent Wireless Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent wireless keyboard. I liked my previous one a little better because of the ergonomic keyboard. Keys are very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this wireless keyboard/mouse combo. It works like a charm -- no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: NCTexas

customer_reviews.title: Nice design.. Not a large range
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard works well and is really responsive but does not have a long range. I bought this for our board room at work (about a 30 foot long room) and it works only about half way down the room. Same with the mouse. Other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: great wireless keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: This product is in a word awesome. I have two of them. Nothing more need be said, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hart

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: This is quality product. Comfortable and dependable. Great features. Very low battery drain.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Review of logitech LX710 keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: Have one at work and really liked the performance and size that I bought another one for work at Home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jarding

product_meta.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop LX 710 Laser
product_meta.description:
More fun with digital photos.Maximize your music and photo experience with easy-to-use, one-touch controls for audio playback and image editing. Enjoy superior comfort with soft-touch surfaces, adjustable keyboard angles, and industry-leading durability and reliability. Additional controls give you direct access to advanced features of Windows Vista such as Document Flip and theyll also work on Windows XP.

AMAZON.COM
Maximize your music and photo experience with easy-to-use, one-touch controls for audio playback and image editing. Enjoy superior comfort with soft-touch surfaces, adjustable keyboard angles, and industry-leading durability and reliability. Additional controls give you direct access to advanced features of Windows Vista — such as Document Flip and they´ll also work on Windows XP.

Features

Adjustable keyboard angles
3-way adjustable tilt legs enable a truly personalized experience. Choose the keyboard angle that maximizes your comfort and matches your style. Programmable hot-keys
Convenient hot-keys instantly open applications, games, folders, and web pages. To customize, simply hold down the desired hot-key with a long press. Cordless laser mouse
Edit photos with pixel precision, or use other features such as vertical or horizontal scrolling, or one-touch zoom.  * Instant Access to Your Music
   Powerful, side-mounted controls give quick access to your favorite media applications, including Apple iTunes or Windows Media Player. 

 * One-Touch Communication
   Stay in touch with a single touch. Manage your Internet communications with handy controls for launching email, messaging, or Internet call
   applications, and for adjusting volume. 

 * Ready for Windows Vista
   Start key and handy DocFlip controls let you get the most out of Windows Vista. Great for Windows XP, too. 

 * Premium comfort
   Integrated soft-touch palm rest provides premium comfort and extra support, and can help reduce fatigue 

System Requirements 

 * PC with Windows XP or Windows Vista 
 * 1 available USB port 
 * CD-ROM drive 

Package Contents

 * Logitech LX 710 Cordless Keyboard 
 * Logitech LX 7 Cordless Laser Mouse 
 * USB mini-receiver 
 * 4 AA alkaline batteries 
 * CD with software, comfort guidelines, and help center 
 * Quick-start guide 
 * Full product support 
 * 5-Year limited hardware warranty
feature_bullets: OS Requirement - Windows XP, or Windows Vista
OS Requirement - Windows XP, or Windows Vista

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars168 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
